column4: Can someone please help? I have installed Ubuntu 6.1, and upon boot it says "Error Loading Operating System." I installed it on a IDE slave drive, formatting it during install. I have Vista installed on a SATA which i normally boot to.
what else can you do other than reinstall? try a different release maybe. 6.06 or 6.10
So it is likely a version being incompatible for me?
I don't know at all, I have never used 6.1. It just seems like if you can't even boot your OS, that particular install is beyond rescue
